question: Recently, the Cabinet Committee for Economic Affairs approved interim extension to Rashtriya Uchchatar Shiksha Abhiyan. In which year, this scheme was launched?
explanation: The Cabinet Committee for Economic Affairs approved the second phase of the centrally sponsored Rashtriya Uchchatar Shiksha Abhiyan (RUSA) for a period of three years i.e. 1st April 2017 to 31st March 2020. The scheme was launched in 2013.
